content: Coconut Wine is the default drink in Black Myth: Wukong, so it can't be found. It is given to you at the start of Chapter 1. Compared to the other Drinks in the game, it offers the most basic buff, but arguably the best for the Gourds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Coconut_Wine.md', within the main section titled 'Coconut Wine'.
The content is as follows:
Coconut Wine is the default drink in Black Myth: Wukong, so it can't be found. It is given to you at the start of Chapter 1. Compared to the other Drinks in the game, it offers the most basic buff, but arguably the best for the Gourds.
